full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 773 Filed 08/10/22 Page 5 of 29 LCRVMAXT 3122 1 MR. EVERDELL: Your Honor, I think then we'll just go with the Dupigny and Almonte one that you raised before. 2 THE COURT: Okay. 3 MS. MOE: Thank you, your Honor. 4 And we also now have the transcript of Matt's testimony. We're happy to hand that up. 5 THE COURT: Okay. One of my law clerks will grab that please and take it to the CSO, while Ms. Williams is getting the supplies; so that just goes to the CSO. 6 In response to the note, I will write: Dear jury, we are gathering the supplies you requested. We've sent back Matt's transcript. As for your question regarding the definition of enticement -- could you give me the page and line again of the charge, Ms. Moe? 7 MS. MOE: Yes, your Honor. It's on pages 21 and 33; those are instruction number 15 and also instruction number 26. 8 THE COURT: Okay. So for page 21, what's the line number or lines? 9 MS. MOE: It's on lines 5 and 6, your Honor. 10 THE COURT: And for 33? 11 MS. MOE: They are on the same lines, your Honor, on lines 5 and 6, page 33. 12 THE COURT: Okay. I left my charge back there. 13 So I'll refer them to pages 21 and -- page 21, lines 5 and 6; and page 33, lines 5 and 6. I will then say: Further, 14 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00014691
